name: @code.gov/code-gov-style
description: Style for code.gov including buttons, banners, and cards. Inspired by and somewhat based on USWDS.

scripts.update-all: npm i && npm run update-font && npm run update-custom-elements && npm run update-polyfills && npm run update-code-gov-web-components && npm run update-assets
scripts.update-assets: cp dist/js/* assets/js/. && cp node_modules/prismjs/prism.js assets/js/. && cp node_modules/prismjs/themes/prism.css assets/css/. && cp node_modules/@webcomponents/custom-elements/custom-elements.min.js.map assets/js/.
scripts.update-custom-elements: npm install -S @webcomponents/custom-elements && cd node_modules/@webcomponents/custom-elements && npm install && npm build

author: Daniel J. Dufour
